item.title: Export Orgmode File In Chinese
item.description: Introduction OrgMode is really cool and export context to latex then processed to PDF is quite straightforwards. However when working with Chinese characters, I need additional packages. First of all, install the following packages. (I already install the texlive package) apt-get install latex-cjk-chinese latex-cjk-xcjk texlive-xetex First solution Then in the org file, add the following latex options. #+LaTeX_HEADER: \usepackage{CJK} #+LaTeX_HEADER: \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{gbsn} A littel drawback here is the \begin{CJK} is added as a header option whice due to it will not be closed when I checked with the tex output.
